name: dfs.namenode.list.reencryption.status.num.responses
description:
When listing re-encryption status, the maximum number of zones
    that will be returned in a batch. Fetching the list incrementally in
    batches improves namenode performance.

name: dfs.namenode.decommission.max.concurrent.tracked.nodes
description:
The maximum number of decommission-in-progress or
    entering-maintenance datanodes nodes that will be tracked at one time by
    the namenode. Tracking these datanode consumes additional NN memory
    proportional to the number of blocks on the datnode. Having a conservative
    limit reduces the potential impact of decommissioning or maintenance of
    a large number of nodes at once.
      
    A value of 0 means no limit will be enforced.

name: ipc.client.connect.max.retries
description:
Indicates the number of retries a client will make to establish
               a server connection.

name: dfs.edit.log.transfer.timeout
description:
Socket timeout for edit log transfer in milliseconds. This timeout
    should be configured such that normal edit log transfer for journal
    node syncing can complete successfully.

name: hadoop.security.kms.client.authentication.retry-count
description: Number of time to retry connecting to KMS on authentication failure

name: dfs.client.deadnode.detection.probe.deadnode.interval.ms
description: Interval time in milliseconds for probing dead node behavior.

name: dfs.ha.fencing.ssh.connect-timeout
description:
SSH connection timeout, in milliseconds, to use with the builtin
    sshfence fencer.

name: dfs.ha.tail-edits.rolledits.timeout
description: The timeout in seconds of calling rollEdits RPC on Active NN.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.resource.cpu-vcores
description: The number of virtual CPU cores the MR AppMaster needs.
